task: Change numbering on the first page
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the first page of the document.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the Word ribbon.
In the 'Header & Footer' section, click on 'Page Number' and select 'Format Page Numbers'.
In the 'Page Number Format' dialog box, select 'Start at' and enter the desired starting number for the first page.
Verify that the numbering on the first page has been changed.
